hr.fer.zemris.ml.model.random_forest

Class RandomForest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.ml.model.random_forest.RandomForest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the target value, usually String for classification and Double for function approximation tasks.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPredictor<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationRandomForest, RegressionRandomForest

    public abstract class RandomForest<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPredictor<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Represents an abstract random forest model containing n decision trees.
    Author:
    Dan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomForest(java.util.List<DecisionTree<T>> trees, int numOfFeatures)
      Creates a new random forest model with given decision trees, but discards their training samples for easier serialization of the model.
